<p class="large" style="line-height:150%;margin-bottom:30px;">
Welcome to this workshop on RNA-Seq. This workshop aims to cover the most important aspects of RNA-Seq analysis using next generation sequencing data. We cover quality control, mapping, quantification and differential gene expression.
</p>

<div class="medium" style="line-height:150%;">
* Before the workshop, please ensure that you have completed the **[Precourse](home_precourse.html)** steps.
* For practical information regarding the workshop venue and travel information, see **[Info](home_info.html)**.
* See **[Schedule](home_schedule.html)** for the current workshop plan in chronological order.
* All lab materials have been collected in a single location under **[Lab](home_lab.html)**.
</div>
